links.title: Why Bulls Say Worries About FAANG Stocks Valuations Are Overdone
links.description: Tech stocks, namely Facebook Inc. ( FB), Amazon.com Inc. ( AMZN), Apple Inc. ( AAPL), Netflix Inc. ( NFLX ) and Alphabet Inc. ( GOOG ), have been flying high all year, pushing valuations to new levels. With price-to-earnings ratios several times higher than long-held averages, investors are getting worried about what could be overheating tech stocks.

links.title: Huawei Gets Caught with Deceptive Marketing Again - UTB Blogs
links.description: Marketing can be many things. But when it comes to Huawei, it appears it can't be honest. A company needs to choose how to market their products. They need to think about their brand, and think about how they want their marketing to be received. The style and feel is very important.

messages.body:
Apple's Stock Is Still Making Warren Buffett Smile, For Now

$AAPL 

https://www.thestreet.com/investing/stocks/apple-stock-is-still-making-warren-buffett-smile-for-now-14687670

links.title: Apple's Stock Is Still Making Warren Buffett Smile, For Now
links.description: 1 trillion and counting, for now. Apple ( AAPL) shares continue to touch records following a better-than-expected second calendar quarter. At $216.67 on Monday, Apple shares have soared 26% so for this year. Apple is now valued at $1.05 trillion, no doubt making large shareholder Warren Buffett quite content.
